settings.text:
Non-customized or non-personalized orders are typically dispatched within 3-5 business days from the date of order placement. However, customized orders require additional time due to the intricate production process, including design modifications, deep engraving, deburring, and multiple finishing steps. As a result, customized orders may take up to 10 business days from the time of order receipt to ensure the highest quality standards are met before packaging for shipment. Please anticipate up to 7 business days for delivery via our complimentary standard shipping service.

.

We operate as a small studio with a dedicated team, and while we strive to expedite order processing, our commitment to maintaining exceptional quality may extend our processing times slightly.

.

Regrettably, at present, we do not offer international shipping options through our website. However, if you have specific requirements, kindly contact us via our contact form, and we will do our best to accommodate your request.

We want to ensure your complete satisfaction with your purchase. If you wish to cancel your order, please contact us within 24 hours of placing the order. Once the order has been shipped, we are unable to accommodate cancellations.

.

To initiate a cancellation request, please send an email to hi@zugo.co.in with the subject line 'PRODUCT RETURN ORDER NO XXXX' and include your order number in the email. If you have ordered multiple products and intend to return some items, kindly specify your request in the email. Upon cancellation of your order, you will receive an email confirmation, and the refunded amount will be credited back to your original method of payment. Kindly allow up to 10 business days for the refund to reflect in your account.

.

At Zugo, we are committed to enhancing both our product quality and customer experience. Your feedback regarding order cancellations is invaluable to us as it enables us to refine our products and services accordingly. We sincerely appreciate your input in helping us improve.

Our jewellery is meticulously handcrafted from raw material,
ensuring that each piece is one-of-a-kind, adding to its individuality. Our skilled team utilizes hand tools to work on metal blanks, infusing each piece with a handmade charm that sets it apart from mass-produced jewelry. We believe this craftsmanship imbues each item with its own special character and uniqueness.

.

Please note that due to the handmade nature of our products, slight variations in appearance may occur compared to the images displayed. These differences can be influenced by various factors, including lighting conditions and the properties of your digital screen. Additionally, special finishing techniques are applied to the materials, resulting in varying appearances when light is reflected at different angles.

.

Rest assured, each product undergoes rigorous quality checks before being carefully packaged for shipping to ensure that it meets our standards of excellence in both aesthetics and functionality.

We aim to ensure that you have ample time to truly appreciate your Zugo jewelry! Our Zugo Promise grants you a 36-day window to return all non-personalized and non-customized Zugo items if you're not entirely satisfied with your purchase. Please note that personalization or customization, which includes any added text or designs during purchase, renders the item ineligible for return.

.

Customization or personalization involves significant labor to create a truly unique jewelry piece that has never existed before. All sales of personalized or customized Zugo items are considered final and cannot be returned.

.

To initiate a return, kindly contact us via our contact form and reference 'Product Return Order No XXXX.' We will provide you with further instructions to facilitate the return process. Please be aware that shipping costs to our manufacturing facility will be the responsibility of the customer.

.

For a full refund, the returned product must be unworn, with original brand tags, and in the exact packaging as received, including all documentation and additional packaging materials. Upon receiving the product as described above, the refund will be sent to the original payment method and would appear in your accounts in about 20 business days.

Our Zugo Promise includes a 36-month or 3-year manufacturer warranty that safeguards against all manufacturing-related defects in Zugo jewelry, whether customized or non-customized. To determine your eligibility for warranty benefits, simply reach out to us via our contact form, providing your order number and details of any manufacturing defects encountered.

.

Upon verification, we will guide you through the necessary steps for returning the product to our manufacturing facility to rectify the defect. As part of our commitment to quality, all manufacturing-related defects will be addressed free of charge for a period of 3 years from the date of purchase, as a complimentary service covered under the product warranty. However, please note that shipping costs to our manufacturing facility are the responsibility of the customer. Upon receiving the product, we will require approximately 7 business days to ship it back.

.

It's important to note that scratches and general wear and tear resulting from normal usage are not considered manufacturing defects.

All offered products are intended for external use exclusively. We make no claims regarding spiritual or medical benefits. Our items are crafted from skin-friendly materials. Should you experience any skin irritation after use, discontinue use immediately and seek medical advice.
